definition: to fall into enemy hands/to be occupied/to degenerate/to submerge
to sink (into ruin, oblivion)/to be reduced to
pitfall/trap/to get stuck/to sink/to cave in/to frame (false charge)/to capture (a city in battle)/to fall (to the enemy)/defect
enemy-held territory

sentences.english: Well, eventually the ottoman Turks attacked Constantinople, it eventually fell.
sentences.chinese: 最後，君士坦丁堡被土耳其攻佔最終淪陷了。

sentences.english: She engineered a spiteful contingency plan should Felucia ever fall.
sentences.chinese: 她策劃了一個惡毒計劃以應對費盧西亞可能的淪陷。

sentences.english: In the occupied areas everything is in the hands of Japanese imperialism.
sentences.chinese: 在淪陷區，則一切被日本帝國主義所獨佔。

sentences.english: Canton fell to the Japanese in 1938, resulting in a mass flight of refugees to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 一九三八年，廣州淪陷，大批難民湧入香港。

sentences.english: The second part of the outbreak of the Mukden Incident and the fall of the Northeast.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分爲九一八事變的爆發與東北淪陷。

sentences.english: In the first section, I compare the colonial literatures of the two areas.
sentences.chinese: 本論文第一部分是對兩地淪陷區的文學的比較。

sentences.english: All my islands have sunk in the deep, so I can hardly relax or even oversleep.
sentences.chinese: 我的孤島深度淪陷，使我不能放鬆，甚至不能睡過頭。

sentences.english: It is the accomplice of Japanese invaders to carry out ideological enslavement activities in enemy-occupied area.
sentences.chinese: 它是日本侵略者在淪陷區實行思想奴化活動的幫兇。

sentences.english: The essential of contradiction conflict is the dominion power of occupied region.
sentences.chinese: 這種矛盾衝突的實質是爭奪淪陷區的統治權。

sentences.english: During the invasion period of Japan to China, Japan implemented the thorough enslavement education in the enemy-occupied area.
sentences.chinese: 日本侵華期間，在淪陷區實施了徹底的奴化教育。

sentences.english: Fanghua water, the waves of tenderness, in a hubbub in the fall.
sentences.chinese: 芳華如水，一波一波的柔情，淪陷在一片喧譁中。

sentences.english: 1941 - Hong Kong falls to the Japanese Imperial Army.
sentences.chinese: 1941年的今天，香港淪陷日本皇軍。

sentences.english: As a woman writer in the colonized Northeast China, Mei Niang owns her own unique literary style .
sentences.chinese: 作爲東北淪陷區女作家，梅孃的創作獨具風格。

sentences.english: Xin Qiji advocates " Attack enemy " , and his idea have the intense emotion that it was bring from the enemy-occupied area people's.
sentences.chinese: 辛棄疾則主張“攻人”，帶着淪陷區人民強烈的情感。

sentences.english: Americans are paying tribute to fallen troops in Memorial Day observances .
sentences.chinese: 美國民衆在紀念日儀式上，向淪陷的軍隊納貢。

sentences.english: The Benbu puppet regime has also committed many crime in the period falling into enemy's hands.
sentences.chinese: 蚌埠僞政權在淪陷時期也犯下了不少罪行。

definition: not bad/tolerable/fortunately
to occupy (a territory)/to hold
to return to one's home country
at once/right away
then/at that time/while
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
that very same year
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
already
then/at that time/in those days
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to offer for sale/to sell/to sell out or betray
to depart/to leave
Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong/Canton
at that time
to put an end to/to annihilate/to cause to perish/to perish/annihilation (in quantum field theory)
